title: How often does this happen to you?
body:
Why does it not give a rating? I waited several minutes too after the game. I don't even know how many points I received..
Has this ever happened to you?

replies.body: You are so good it doesn't even bother giving you a rating?
I got a simialr result with Ez(20 0 10 i think) and it did give me like 1200 points. Tons of points
You should still have gotten points for this. Sorry that the grade didn't load! If this happens again send me the match history and we'll take a look.

Thanks so much! Yes it has happened before if it happens again how should I send the match history?
{{champion:22}}

It's happened again this time ranked game and I didnt have 0 deaths (so its not because of that) bc for some reason their whole team would make unreasonable and unbelievable losses just to sneak across map to kill me :( ...yep in ranked
{{champion:22}}
I JUST MADE A POST ABOUT THIS LOL srry for caps 2 lazy 2 fix

Huh. Never seen tri force on lux before.

EDIT: Ashe ._.

oh well if you want to maybe we could play together sometimes
{{champion:22}}

> [{quoted}](name=1 small fly,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=1b99zh1r,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-09T00:57:35.438+0000)
>
> oh well if you want to maybe we could play together sometimes
> {{champion:22}}

Tbh it would be nice to play with someone for a change. And I'd also like to see the the kiting with the phage and q slows. I feel like it would be the closest you can get to Kalista's level of kiting. :P
you went 19-0. You probably broke it

Happens every time I take {{champion:44}} jg. 

Seems I broke the system

This happened to me twice on the PBE, but hasn't happened at all on live.  Both times on the PBE I had been spam clicking to close the game ASAP before the "Victory" Fully loaded(If you click where the button appears you can click it before you see it).  If you do the same, maybe that's the cause?
So Triforce Ashe....appears to be an effective build.
I haven't received this error yet. The Champion Mastery has been working well for me and I like knowing how well I did. It's quite comforting after a loss.
